original_text: These false teachers who have come among you do the same kind of bad things. Their dreams deceive them so that they use their bodies to do disgusting things. They refuse to obey God's authority. They insult God's powerful angels.
korean_text: 그러한데 꿈꾸는 이 사람들도 그와 같이 육체를 더럽히며 권위를 업신여기며 영광을 비방하는도다

sentences.original_text: These false teachers have come among you
sentences.korean_translation: 이 거짓 교사들이 너희 가운데 와서

sentences.original_text: who do the same kind of bad things
so that they use their bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 그들로 하여금 그들의 몸을 사용하게 하여

sentences.original_text: They refuse to obey God's authority
